text:
Scott Disick and Sofia Richie enjoyed another date night on Friday, 23 February while the model is also feeling extra love at home from two new family members.

The 19-year-old blond beauty shared photos of her new puppies, a cream longhaired dachshund and dapple dachshund, playing near a dog crate via an Instagram.

Scott Disick and Sofia Richie Enjoy Date Night as She Introduces Second Puppy

Source: eonline

In the following day, Sofia was photographed with boyfriend Scott as they dressed casually while leaving the Shibuya sushi restaurant in Calabasas.

Last week, Sofia had introduced her dapple dachshund pup on Instagram, captioning,

Our newest family member.

Here's the post, check it out.

At the at the launch of Issey Miyake fragrances L'Eau d'Issey Nectar and L'Eau Majeure d'Issey at Milk Studios in Los Angeles on Thursday, Sofia told PEOPLE that the dog was a gift from Scott.

She said,

He wanted the dog for a while, but he ended up surprising me with it,

She further added,

Her name's Hershela. My boyfriend named her...I kind of just ran with it. It made me laugh. I liked Hershey and he liked Hershela, so it was like a middle ground.

Sofia introduced baby no. 2 on Friday.

@sofiarichie via instagram stories A post shared by Sofia Richie Updates (@sofiarsupport) on Feb 24, 2018 at 12:51am PST

Sofia and Scott have been dating for several months. Their relationship is the longest Scott has had since Kourtney Kardashian, with whom he has three children, split from him in July 2015.
